name: Michael's super early demo!
description:
Michael's basics full game has a demo! this demo is where it showcases the things that are going to be in the full game. as this game keeps updating it will turn into a full game.

Can I mod this?

yes if you want to. even if I didn't get much done you are welcome to mod it.

When I'm done with the entire game, mac, 32bit, and the game jolt release will come soon!

There will be a lot of bugs in the game I mean a lot! if there are any bugs comment on the page or on the feed.e

EDIT: This game might look bad at the moment but I promise you it will be better when it updates
